attributes.action: Rehold the EU membership referendum, allowing 16 year olds and above to vote.
attributes.additional_details: The decision to leave has caused outrage with the generation with no voice.
attributes.background: The decision to leave the EU effects the younger generations more than anyone else. Let young people have a say in their future instead of relying on the vote of others. Hold the EU referendum again and let this generation have a say.
